claim.text: The volatility forecasting task refers to predicting the amount of variability in the price of a financial asset over a certain period.
claim.exact_quote: The volatility forecasting task refers to predicting the amount of variability in the price of a financial asset over a certain period.

evidence.evidence_text: The volatility forecasting task refers to predicting the amount of variability in the price of a financial asset over a certain period.
evidence.exact_quote: Predicting how the degree of variability in the price of a financial asset will vary over a certain period – the so-called volatility of the asset – is an important financial analysis task.

claim.text: This paper proposes a novel hierarchical, transformer, multi-task architecture designed to harness the text and audio data from quarterly earnings conference calls to predict future price volatility in the short and long term.
claim.exact_quote: This paper proposes a novel hierarchical, transformer, multi-task architecture designed to harness the text and audio data from quarterly earnings conference calls to predict future price volatility in the short and long term.

evidence.evidence_text: This paper proposes a novel hierarchical, transformer, multi-task architecture designed to harness the text and audio data from quarterly earnings conference calls to predict future price volatility in the short and long term.
evidence.exact_quote: This paper proposes a novel hierarchical, transformer, multi-task architecture designed to harness the text and audio data from quarterly earnings conference calls to predict future price volatility in the short and long term.

claim.text: The primary technical contributions include a description and evaluation of a novel, deep-learning architecture for this task: Figure 2 presents our Hierarchical, Transformer-based, Multi-Task (HTML) model which combines a hierarchical, transformer with multi-task learning.
claim.exact_quote: The primary technical contributions include a description and evaluation of a novel, deep-learning architecture for this task: Figure 2 presents our Hierarchical, Transformer-based, Multi-Task (HTML) model which combines a hierarchical, transformer with multi-task learning.

evidence.evidence_text: The primary technical contributions include a description and evaluation of a novel, deep-learning architecture for this task: Figure 2 presents our Hierarchical, Transformer-based, Multi-Task (HTML) model which combines a hierarchical, transformer with multi-task learning.
evidence.exact_quote: The primary technical contributions include a description and evaluation of a novel, deep-learning architecture for this task: Figure 2 presents our Hierarchical, Transformer-based, Multi-Task (HTML) model which combines a hierarchical, transformer with multi-task learning.

claim.text: The model builds on very recent work by [46] and delivers substantial performance improvements, for short and long-term volatility prediction, providing a new performance benchmark for this task.
claim.exact_quote: The model builds on very recent work by [46] and delivers substantial performance improvements, for short and long-term volatility prediction, providing a new performance benchmark for this task.

evidence.evidence_text: The model builds on very recent work by [46] and delivers substantial performance improvements, for short and long-term volatility prediction, providing a new performance benchmark for this task.
evidence.exact_quote: The model builds on very recent work by [46] and delivers substantial performance improvements, for short and long-term volatility prediction, providing a new performance benchmark for this task.

claim.text: The utility of audio data, and vocal features, in this important financial prediction task, suggests there exists a significant opportunity to explore the use of audio features in a range of related or complementary tasks (e.g. fraud detection, asset pricing, stock recommendation etc.), where such data is readily available alongside more traditional forms of financial data.
claim.exact_quote: The utility of audio data, and vocal features, in this important financial prediction task, suggests there exists a significant opportunity to explore the use of audio features in a range of related or complementary tasks (e.g. fraud detection, asset pricing, stock recommendation etc.), where such data is readily available alongside more traditional forms of financial data.
